Articles.Content: Which engine do you prefer: Vector or Mammoth?

Of course it depends on the application...but you can pile a ton of vector's onto a single fuel tank and get stupid fast acceleration. So that's kind of fun sometimes. The gimbal on the vector's is the bigger challenge.
Vectors. They have a bottom node, they have awesome gimbaling, and the mammoth is only useable on large craft.
Whichever works best for the craft I'm building.

1 hour ago, Brian444444 said:

Of course it depends on the application...but you can pile a ton of vector's onto a single fuel tank and get stupid fast acceleration. So that's kind of fun sometimes. The gimbal on the vector's is the bigger challenge.

Agreed.
